trans-unit.source: By default, APIs in a Mobile App backend can be invoked anonymously.
trans-unit.target: By default, APIs in a Mobile App backend can be invoked anonymously.

trans-unit.source: Next, you need to restrict access to only authenticated clients.
trans-unit.target: Next, you need to restrict access to only authenticated clients.

trans-unit.source: In your Mobile App's **Settings**, click **Easy Tables** and select your table.
trans-unit.target: In your Mobile App's **Settings**, click **Easy Tables** and select your table.

trans-unit.source: Click **Change permissions**, select **Authenticated access only** for all permissions, then click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Change permissions**, select **Authenticated access only** for all permissions, then click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: In the server project, navigate to **Controllers** > **TodoItemController.cs**.
trans-unit.target: In the server project, navigate to **Controllers** > **TodoItemController.cs**.

trans-unit.source: Add the `[Authorize]` attribute to the **TodoItemController** class, as follows.
trans-unit.target: Add the `[Authorize]` attribute to the **TodoItemController** class, as follows.

trans-unit.source: To restrict access only to specific methods, you can also apply this attribute just to those methods instead of the class.
trans-unit.target: To restrict access only to specific methods, you can also apply this attribute just to those methods instead of the class.

trans-unit.source: To require authentication for table access, add the following line to the Node.js server script:
trans-unit.target: To require authentication for table access, add the following line to the Node.js server script:
